message: My head...!
No! Not now!
I... have to stop Koujaku...
Koujaku...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Calm down!"
Pushing through the pain, I manage to get out a cry that stops Koujaku cold.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Aoba."
Slowly, Koujaku turns. I can tell from his expression that his anger has subsided.
Relieved, I collapse onto the futon. Koujaku races to support me.

name: 紅雀
message: "You okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I should be asking you that."
Koujaku pauses and lets his eyes wander around the room.
Based on what I heard... Ryuuhou was the one who did Koujaku's tattoos.
I don't know if it's related, but Koujaku seems to truly hate Ryuuhou, enough to lose his mind.
Why did Ryuuhou tattoo Koujaku?
And why does Koujaku hate him so?
It feels like it should all connect somehow... but I just can't put it together.
Koujaku is silent for a moment before looking up at me.

name: 紅雀
message: "...First, I have to apologize. I'm sorry. And... for what I did yesterday, too."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Koujaku!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Are you alright?!"
Suddenly, the door bursts open and two men enter, shouting.
Koujaku smiles at the sight of them.

name: 紅雀
message: "You took your sweet time."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Sorry!"
They're Beni-Shigure members. As I watch, several more file in behind them.

name: 蒼葉
message: "How did you guys get in here?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Cop who owes us a favor got them in."
I remember hearing that Beni-Shigure had police contacts. So that's how they got in...

name: 紅雀
message: "Toue's having that event soon, remember? They've been recruiting cops for extra security."

name: 紅雀
message: "These guys snuck in as new recruits. It's just for the event, so no one's looking too closely."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Easy for you to say. I was scared shitless they'd make us."

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Seriously, dude! Every time they asked for ID, I felt like my heart was gonna stop."

name: 紅雀
message: "Haha. Well, it all worked out, right?"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Guess so!"

name: 紅雀
message: "But man, that asshole sure runs fast..."
He must mean Ryuuhou.

name: 紅雀
message: "So he really didn't do anything to you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "Good... Where the hell could he have gone?"

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Wait, you mean the guy in the kimono?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Then the guys outside are already after him! I got word they saw this guy in a kimono fleeing the scene. Thought he was shady as hell, so they followed him."

name: 紅雀
message: "Good thinking."

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Hehe."
That's Beni-Shigure for you. They're known for their teamwork.

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "We should hear from them later. The rest of the guys are chilling in a warehouse. The cop gave us the code for the back entrance."

name: 紅雀
message: "Got it. Let's head there. I don't wanna waste any more time in this shithole."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Got it, boss!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba, we need to move. Think you can make it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "Up you go."
Koujaku puts an arm beneath my shoulder and helps me up.

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "You okay? Lemme help!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sorry, guys."
One of Koujaku's guys takes my other shoulder.

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "I got your bag and your Allmate!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "No problem! I love dogs!"

name: 蓮
message: "Arf arf!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Ahaha!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Okay, let's get outta here."
Ryuuhou's drug hasn't worn off yet, but at least these guys are here to help.
Together, we leave the club behind.
